events.name: San Gabriel Mountains Trailbuilders
events.description: The San Gabriel Mountains Trailbuilders work the 1st, 3rd, and 5th Saturday of every month, and we work special projects which are not scheduled. Please email us to get on to the mailinglist to keep informed about scheduled and special projects! Email Ben atbwootenwhite@hotmail.com

events.name: Rubio Canyon Trail Work
events.description: Beginners welcome. The group meets every other Saturday at 8AM in Altadena. See here for more details https://www.signupgenius.com/go/10c0f4aabae2ba4ffc61-volunteer2

events.name: Join Lowelifes for trail work Labor Day Weekend
events.description:
Lowelifes has made significant progress restoring the burned and heavily-damaged Gabrilieno NRT and Kenyon Devore trails in the 2020 Bobcat Fire burn zone. On Labor Day weekend, we will continue our fire recovery efforts on the historic Silver Moccasin NRT. As you can see from the photo above, Silver Moc was also torched down to the soil, but flora is growing back, including in the trail tread.
Give us a holler if you'd like to help work on September 3 - 4! 

If you only have time to work one day, you are welcome to attend Saturday only. To entice you to stay for both days, we will offer a tasty dinner on Saturday night, including a veggie option!

Please email us to RSVP and for more information.

board@lowelifesrcc.org
